short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trusted Device Identifier for SLIMS Application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SLIMS Trusted Device Identifier is an extension for users who are using our application SLIMS(Sufalam Laboratory Information System) which is a SaaS-based laboratory software provider.

Customers who want to use functionality to access SLIMS applications from trusted devices only then they must use this extension to identify their current PC identity.

There is no user interaction required for this extension it will work in the background.

If you want to know more about SLIMS ( Sufalam Laboratory Information System) then please visit https://sufalam.com
